#ccm 07:44 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 08:28 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 08:29 <kushalkhandelwal> Hey 08:40 <sdumitriu> Hey 08:42 <sdumitriu> kushalkhandelwal: https://wiki.jenkins-ci.org/display/JENKINS/Github+pull+request+builder+plugin 08:43 <sdumitriu> Travis isn't exactly a CI system 08:43 <sdumitriu> It only runs tests and checks that no tests fail 08:43 <sdumitriu> Jenkins does more 08:44 <kushalkhandelwal> Travis builds it runs tests and check for failures 08:44 <kushalkhandelwal> What else can we do with Jenkins ? 08:45 <kushalkhandelwal> Can we deploy with jenkins ? 08:47 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu, ? 08:48 <sdumitriu> Yes, we already deploy to nexus.cs.toronto.edu 08:48 <sdumitriu> And it also has more details 08:48 <sdumitriu> For example, it can report which tests failed nicely 08:48 <sdumitriu> ttyl, going to sdumitriu1 08:49 <kushalkhandelwal> :P 08:49 <kushalkhandelwal> You change machines ? 09:00 <kushalkhandelwal> has
